## Conversion.Converter.mapItems() method

Creates a [Converter](./ts-utils.converter.md) which maps the individual items of a collection resulting from this [Converter](./ts-utils.converter.md) using the supplied map function.

**Signature:**

```typescript
mapItems<TI>(mapper: (from: unknown, context?: TC) => Result<TI>): Converter<TI[], TC>;
```

## Parameters

<table><thead><tr><th>

Parameter


</th><th>

Type


</th><th>

Description


</th></tr></thead>
<tbody><tr><td>

mapper


</td><td>

(from: unknown, context?: TC) =&gt; [Result](./ts-utils.result.md)<!-- -->&lt;TI&gt;


</td><td>

The map function to be applied to each element of the result of this [Converter](./ts-utils.converter.md)<!-- -->.


</td></tr>
</tbody></table>

**Returns:**

[Converter](./ts-utils.converter.md)<!-- -->&lt;TI\[\], TC&gt;

A new [Converter](./ts-utils.converter.md) returning `<TI[]>`<!-- -->.

## Remarks

Fails if `from` is not an array.
